meanings.definition: The largest tarsal bone in the human foot.
meanings.sent1: The calcaneus helps support the weight of the body when standing.
meanings.sent2: I landed on my calcaneus when I jumped off the step.
meanings.sent3: The calcaneus bone went to a party and had a heel of a time!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the calcaneus bone in her foot.
meanings.sent5: The calcaneus bone is like a sturdy pillar in the structure of the foot.

meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his calcaneus after running for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The shoe had extra cushioning to protect the calcaneus from impact.
meanings.sent3: The calcaneus bone rolled down the hill and shouted, 'I'm the heel of the situation!'
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as unyielding as the calcaneus bone in her heel.
meanings.sent5: The calcaneus bone is like a solid foundation supporting the entire foot structure.
